mapper.insert: select uuid() insert into tp_practice (id,title,gradeName,subjectName,remarks,createId,modiyId,createTime,isShown) values (#{id},#{title},#{gradeName},#{subjectName},#{remarks},#{createId},#{modiyId},#{createTime},#{isShown})
mapper.update:
update tp_practice
id = #{id},
title = #{title},
gradeName = #{gradeName},
subjectName = #{subjectName},
remarks = #{remarks},
createId = #{createId},
modiyId = #{modiyId},
createTime = #{createTime},
isShown = #{isShown}
where id = #{id}

update tp_practice set id = #{id}, title = #{title}, gradeName = #{gradeName}, subjectName = #{subjectName}, remarks = #{remarks}, createId = #{createId}, modiyId = #{modiyId}, createTime = #{createTime}, isShown = #{isShown} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select sd.`value` as gradeName, u.nickName as createId, t.id,t.title,t.subjectName,t.remarks,t.modiyId,t.createTime,t.isShown from tp_practice t left join sys_dict sd on sd.id= t.gradeName and sd.keyname ='G' left join `user` u on u.id = t.createId
and t.title like concat('%',#{searchTitle},'%')
